å®—é–€_desc_1: The sect is newly established. Disciples can take on training tasks and accumulate merit to strengthen the sect's reputation.
å®—é–€_desc_2: The Alchemy Hall has been established. Disciples can purchase rare pills here to aid their cultivation.
å®—é–€_desc_3: The sect's foundation is growing. Task rewards have increased. Disciples, study hard and do not waste your youth.
å®—é–€_desc_4: The Spirit Gathering Array is complete. Cultivating here provides twice the result with half the effort.
å®—é–€_desc_5: The sect has reached perfection, shaking the world. Thousands of immortals visit, and the Great Dao is within reach.
sect_task_adventure_1: Travel through the mortal world to temper your state of mind.
sect_task_adventure_2: Venture deep into wild mountains and marshes to find opportunities.
sect_task_adventure_3: Walk among mortals to eliminate demons and stabilize your Dao heart.
sect_task_adventure_4: Visit ancient ruins to seek insights from predecessors.
sect_task_adventure_5: Breathe in the spiritual energy atop a ten-thousand-foot cliff.
sect_task_crusade_1: Monsters are causing chaos in the North; go quell the trouble.
sect_task_crusade_2: Demonic cultists spotted in Black Wind Ridge; eliminate them.
sect_task_crusade_3: Traitors are hiding in the Sect's forbidden zone; clear the gate.
sect_task_crusade_4: Abyss creatures are stirring; seal the rift and protect our land.
sect_task_crusade_5: Exterminate beasts occupying the spirit vein and reclaim sect assets.
sect_task_treasure_1: Rumors say a rare treasure has appeared in Sunset Valley; investigate.
sect_task_treasure_2: Ancient scrolls mention an immortal's remains near the East Sea.
sect_task_treasure_3: Go deep into the earth's fire veins to find legendary Star Metal.
sect_task_treasure_4: Explore ancient battlefields for lost magical treasure fragments.
sect_task_treasure_5: Track the Seven-Colored Heaven-Swallowing Python for spirit herbs.
sect_task_secret_1: The Sect's exclusive secret realm is open; seek a breakthrough.
sect_task_secret_2: A mysterious cave has appeared in the void; find the opportunities.
sect_task_secret_3: Enter the 'Moon Illusion Cave' to test your will against inner demons.
sect_task_secret_4: Explore the 'Five Elements Forbidden Zone' and perceive their cycle.
sect_task_secret_5: Venture into the 'River of Time' projection and sense the flow of years.

æœ¬éŠæˆ²æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾ä¿®ä»™ä¸»é¡Œçš„æ”¾ç½®é¡: This is a cultivation-themed idle web game. You play as a cultivator, gathering resources, building your cave heaven, training skills, and finally facing tribulation to ascend and seek the truth of the Dao.
è³‡æºæ˜¯ä¿®ä»™çš„åŸºç¤ã€‚éˆçŸ³ç”¨æ–¼è²¨å: Resources are the foundation of cultivation. Spirit Stones for currency, Spirit Wood and Iron for upgrades, and Spirit Grass for alchemy. Balancing resource allocation is key in the early game.
æ´åºœå»ºç¯‰æä¾›å„é …åŠ æˆã€‚ã€Œèšéˆé™£ã€: Buildings provide bonuses. 'Spirit Array' gathers energy, 'Alchemy Room' crafts pills, 'Scripture Hall' unlocks skills. Upgrading buildings is the main way to increase power.
